content: 1. Update Jest configuration to exclude node_modules and improve coverage collection
1.1 Write tests to verify current Jest config issues
1.2 Update collectCoverageFrom patterns to exclude unnecessary files
1.3 Add coveragePathIgnorePatterns to explicitly exclude node_modules
1.4 Increase test timeout for coverage collection
1.5 Add maxWorkers configuration to prevent resource exhaustion
1.6 Verify all tests pass with new configuration
